snippet: Even if they are treated early with antiretroviral drugs, children born with the infection were found to be at greater risk.
abstract: Kunjal Patel study in in journal Circulation finds that children born with HIV are more likely to have heart problems later in life, even if they are treated early with antiretroviral drugs.
lead_paragraph: Even if they are treated early with antiretroviral drugs, children born with the infection were found to be at greater risk.

headline.main: Heart Problems Linked to Those Born With H.I.V.
headline.print_headline: Heart Problems Linked to Those Born With H.I.V.
